
import java.util.*;
public class solution1 {
	String name;
	
	public solution1()
	{
		System.out.println("Constructor Called");
		name="Nithish Kumar";
		
    }
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		solution1 sol=new solution1();
		System.out.println(sol.name);

	}

}

Output
Constructor Called
Nithish Kumar
